definition: A beverage typically enjoyed in the early hours of the day, often accompanied by breakfast or as a way to start the morning. It is commonly consumed to provide a boost of energy and to help awaken the senses.

examples.german: Ich trinke meinen Morgenkaffee immer schwarz.
examples.english: I always drink my morning coffee black.

examples.german: Kannst du mir bitte einen Morgenkaffee machen?
examples.english: Can you please make me a morning coffee?
Morning coffee is my favorite drink.

examples.german: Ich genieße meinen Morgenkaffee auf der Terrasse.
examples.english: I enjoy my morning coffee on the terrace.

examples.german: Der Duft von frisch gebrühtem Morgenkaffee ist unwiderstehlich.
examples.english: The aroma of freshly brewed morning coffee is irresistible.
